attributes.action: Make our gp's see people. Not phone call appointments
attributes.additional_details: We have been told by receptionist that they are protecting the nurses from covid yet its now possible to get routine dental appointments. People are being sent from our doctors to a&e for everything
attributes.background: Make our gp surgery start seeing people again for every day ailments ie ear infections and routine appointments

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
